description: A resource has no more than one value of skos:prefLabel per language tag, and no more than one value of skos:prefLabel without language tag.
The range of skos:prefLabel is the class of RDF plain literals.

skos:prefLabel, skos:altLabel and skos:hiddenLabel are pairwise
      disjoint properties.

definition: The preferred lexical label for a resource, in a given language.

label: preferred label
